actions.action: Parse the parents (i.e. the standard_toolkit section) of anonymous specifications.
Implement a visitor that annotates an AST indicating where braces are needed to enforce the given priority. This is needed by printers that walk over an AST and print one of the markup languages.
Add a LocAnn to every term created in the parser so other tools can identify the position of the term.

Improve the operator table so that the rules from Section 8.3 are followed. i.e. If an operator is defined more than once in the same scope, it must have the same type, precedence, and associativity, two whole operator names can never be the same, and operators with the same precedence must also have the same associativity.

Implement support for generic schema definition parargraphs in the Latex2Unicode classes (templates/Latex2Unicode). Currently generic schema definitions cannot be properly transformed from latex markup to unicode.
Parse latex markup directives (%%Zchar etc.) Currently they are ignored.
Add rules to the parser to handle Yuan Fang's changes to the Object-Z schema (i.e. SelfExpr, PolyExpr, PromotedAttrExpr, and ContainmentExpr).
Develop an e-mail markup to unicode converter. It should return Symbol objects so that it can be fitted into the CztReader.
